name: Jump King - Soundtrack
detailed_description:
This is the original soundtrack of Jump King, composed by talented musicians Nils Eklöf and Elias Thörnlund. It features 30 tracks (18 from the base game and 12 from New Babe+) and also has bonus tracks that were not included in the game! To get the best experience with Jump King, and to avoid any spoilers - We recommend waiting until completing the game before listening to the soundtrack!

Track List Original

  • 1. Menu Theme
  • 2. Sewer
  • 3. Fallen King
  • 4. Dreeg's Theme
  • 5. Bad Vibe
  • 6. Despair
  • 7. Masse
  • 8. Sky Blue
  • 9. Coronation
  • 10. Sunrise
  • 11. At First Sight
  • 12. A Legend Lives On
  • 13. Jump King
  • 14. Menu Theme (8-bit)
  • 15. Alternative Theme
  • 16. Alchemist
  • 17. Coronation (Requiem)
  • 18. Jump King Choir

Track List New Babe+

  • 1. Forgotten woods
  • 2. Aurora
  • 3. Frozen Throne
  • 4. Plague
  • 5. Lost In Time
  • 6. Deep Roots
  • 7. Sanctum
  • 8. Afloat
  • 9. Toccata
  • 10. Moon
  • 11. One Love
  • 12. Fate
